Paid maternity leave: 16 weeks 100% (however, no fewer than 10 weeks must be after delivery, even if the pre-delivery leave was longer due to a late birth)
Paid paternity leave: 4 weeks 100% (or 8 weeks for staff members serving at locations where they are not allowed to live with their family)
Restrictions: The fact that a staff member is or will be on parental leave cannot be a factor in deciding contract renewal. To ensure that this is enforced, if a contract ends while the staff member is on parental leave, the contract must be extended to cover the duration of such leave.
